text: "Last Name" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her second studio album, Carnival Ride (2007). ==Music video== The music video for "Last Name" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on May 9, 2008. The video debuted at number 3 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of May 16, 2008. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for seven consecutive weeks. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Last Name
